title: ChatGPT Tools Unleashed: Navigating Advanced Features
description: This course delves into medium-level features of ChatGPT, such as memory and custom instructions, tailored for professionals seeking to enhance their proficiency without coding.
It balances foundational knowledge with advanced content, ensuring participants are not overwhelmed within the 24-hour framework.
The course provides explicit actionable frameworks for integrating these advanced features into professional workflows.
Practical exercises and case studies are utilized to reinforce learning and application, ensuring clarity and impact.
Participants will engage in hands-on exercises to practice and implement these tools, enhancing their ability to leverage ChatGPT's capabilities effectively in their respective fields.
